attributes.action: Stop Council Household Waste Recycling Centres charging for any domestic waste.
attributes.additional_details:
Staffordshire county council charge £6 to dispose of a toilet with cistern. 
£3 per bag of rubble or plasterboard. etc view their website for more details. 

Councils should aim to encourage recycling and correct disposal of waste, not discourage it by charging.
attributes.background: Councils are increasingly starting to charge for waste deemed as non-household waste despite deriving from a household. This includes, rubble, plasterboard, sanitary ware, drainage pipes etc.This is not cost effective and will increase the amount of fly tipping.This excludes commercial derived waste
